text: NGC 172 is a spiral galaxy located around 136 million light-years away in the constellation Cetus. It was discovered in 1886 by astronomer Frank Muller. ==See also== *List of NGC objects (1–1000) ==References== ==External links== * * 0172 Category:Cetus (constellation) Category:Astronomical objects discovered in 1886 Category:Discoveries by Frank Muller
title: NGC 172
